article.title: BAE to Support Doppler GPS Navigation
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: BAE, Wayne, N.J., was awarded a $226 million firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of components, repairs, maintenance and services in support of the Doppler GPS Navigation Sets. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, N.J., is the contracting activity.
